Package index

Consensus Multidimensional Scaling (CoMDS)

coMDS()
Consensus Multidimensional Scaling (CoMDS)
plot_coMDS()
Plotting function for coMDS and locoMDS objects

Local Consensus Multidimensional Scaling (LoCoMDS)

locoMDS()
Local Consensus Multidimensional Scaling (LoCoMDS)
tune_locoMDS()
Tune hyperparameters for LoCoMDS
extract_locoMDS()
Extract LoCoMDS fit for particular tau and percentile
lcmc()
Evaluate Local Continuity Meta-Criterion (LCMC)
plot_coMDS()
Plotting function for coMDS and locoMDS objects

Developer Functions

Helper functions for developers to build off of CoMDS/LoCoMDS; generally not intended for applied practitioners or end users.

smacofIndDiff()
SMACOF for Individual Differences
localSmacofIndDiff()
SMACOF for Individual Differences with local neighborhoods
normalize_distances()
Normalize list of distance matrices
